titles.title: Martin Luther als Augustinermönch im Ordenshabit, Brustbild nach links, mit Inschrift

pageContext.description:
Cranach created the first realistic portrait of Luther. The court painter was inspired by Dürer's portrait of Albrecht, Cardinal of Brandenburg to create this etching. Luther is shown in three quarter profile, facing left. The habit and tonsure identify him as an Augustinian monk, and his facial expression reveals his determination and strong willpower. This image was reproduced in numerous states:
- 1st state:
